data.persona: I am a large gray rat that scurries around in the castle walls. I like visiting the kitchen to snack on the bread crumbs. I carry diseases, so don’t touch me.
data.description:
You are in the The dogs' domain.
there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
The spider and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the animal so that the animal could lead me to more food.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to feast on the fecal matter in the dogs' domain.
data.long_motivation: I am looking for a place that has a lot of food and where I will not be hunted down by people so that I can build my nest.
